arts.ttl: Dusan Vlahovic to Arsenal: Gunners to give 'go-ahead' to 'super exchange' including £45m player?
arts.sum: Arsenal could reportedly be open to negotiating a swap deal in order to sign Juventus striker Dusan Vlahovic in the January transfer window.

arts.ttl: Nicola: “We played a good game until 2-0, then Juventus’ quality came out”
arts.sum: Following Cagliari’s 4-0 loss to Juventus in the Coppa Italia, head coach Davide Nicola addressed the media, discussing the match’s turning points and his team’s performance. Despite the heavy scoreline, Nicola expressed pride in his players’ efforts up until a critical moment in the game. “Excellent match until the 2-0,” Nicola remarked. “Then we dropped a bit, and the quality of Juventus came through. We honored the Coppa Italia to the best of our ability; we faced a great team, and I regret that we could have taken the lead in the first half. arts.ttl: Juventus Director Giuntoli discusses Vlahovic’s contract renewal
arts.sum: Juventus sporting director Cristiano Giuntoli addressed the ongoing discussions surrounding Dusan Vlahovic’s contract renewal. Giuntoli expressed optimism about the relationship with the Serbian striker and his agent, stating, “The relationship with him and his agent is extraordinary. He still has a year left on his contract, and we will meet after the transfer market. There is still time to sort things out and move forward in the best possible way.” Giuntoli also touched on his recent contact with Jorge Mendes, the agent representing players such as Francisco Conceicao and Antonio Silva from Benfica, who is reportedly a target for Juventus The post Juventus Director Giuntoli discusses Vlahovic’s contract renewal appeared first on FootItalia.com.
